title: r111
author: r111
content: DIVINE JUSTICE TO EARTHLY HUMANITY; THE FINAL JUDGMENT BEGINS WITH THE OWN UNDERSTANDING; EVERY ACT CARRIED OUT BY THE SPIRIT, IS AN ACT OF FIRST JUSTICE.-Yes son; the Final Judgment begins with the acts themselves; each act is a magnetic point put into action; each act has time, space and philosophy; saying or thinking a thought is an image that is created around the body; the spirit is judged molecule by molecule; and each act is divided by 318 thinking lines; because all human thinking is composed of 318 virtues; each act is composed of ideas that contain the quality and quality of the spirit; every act is a whole sky that is set in motion; for every idea being microscopic, becomes gigantic in the Kingdom of Heavens; it was written that every humble is great in the Kingdom; and each one of the 318 virtues that accompanied you in life, is a living giant in the Kingdom; and each one has their universes with their respective philosophy; just as every spirit has its own family; before you came to life, you made alliances with these virtues; and all of you promised the Father, to exalt him above all things; and the virtues were entrusted to you; you promised not to violate the Father's law; and the living virtues accompanied you in the trials of life, with that condition: Do not violate in anything, what belongs to the Father; the Scriptures and Commandments of him; your acts being microscopic, are taken into account first; because from the smallest thing that you can create, it starts to judge you; all your ideas are registered in yourselves; your spirit is like a living television; shines with many colors; it is like a ruby; and in the midst of the brightness, your acts are seen; each scene is seen in its smallest details; on Earth you will be judged by my Solar First-born Son Christ; the one who promised to return; and when you are in front of Him, He will look at your scenes that you have around your body; my son will shine on his face like a sun; Were you not taught that he would return bright as a sun of wisdom? Therefore, it should not cause you much surprise; more, I see that few have prepared themselves to receive him; few have searched as all promised; few have searched the Scriptures in their spare hours; the world is illusioned and materialized; one was born to understand the Father from a distant world called Earth; behold the supreme cause that is above all things; The rest will come in addition; the rest is the natural law of evolution; every mandate constitutes an eternal line of worlds, universes and galaxies; and in all, the only cause is the Father; represented in the Scriptures; he who was indifferent with the Father, do not expect anything; because he will live to repentance; your life would be reduced to the mundane; and not as you promised, to the laws of eternity; that is, to what is of the Father; you were excited by the science of good; for capitalism that only lives a present; your lifestyle condemned you; since you divided yourselves between philosophies that came from money and a certain interest in the things of the Father; to adore the Father above all things, is to comply with his laws in all the moments of life; when a life system does not take into account what is of the Father, such system and its followers, do not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; because they did not fulfill what was promised; to adore the Father was not to adore him materially; because the creatures do not learn anything by worshiping images; just the opposite; his spirituality recedes; and they are exposed to sanctimoniousness and beatitude that they will never understand; the true worship of the Father is in the spiritual merit; it is in the work that is carried out and that is for the collective benefit; you will earn your bread with the sweat of your brow means the same; only work, whether physical or intellectual, causes sweat on the face; this parable also contains a prophecy that has been fulfilled through the centuries; the exploitation that met the honest man; this own exploitation of your life system is not from the Father; belongs to the ambitious of the world; the demons who experiment with the first illusion that comes their way; no capitalist in the world has worried if what they created is in accordance with the mandates of the Father; they are as blind as religious spirits; the so-called capitalism divided my children into rich and poor; and the religious rock also divided them into many beliefs; there being only one God; a single Father; a single truth; this rock of human egoism diverted the spiritual evolution of my children; who searched for the truth through other wrong paths; they created as many religious rocks; more were divided; humanity was deceived by opportunistic spirits; as malicious, as satan himself; like they are the same as his damned legion; satan divided the angels in the Kingdom; and the religious spirits divided down on Earth, the men; the same heritage of the devil; it would be better for them not to have asked for the religious test; if with this they divided the faith of a world; because in this way they will also be divided between the light and the darkness; only satan divides himself; the world they divided will divide them; because with the rod that they measured, so they will be measured; the same thing will happen with the ambitious ones who created what you call money; the one that has corrupted millions and millions of my children; here are your guides of the world; behold satan incarnated among you; behold his inheritance; just cry and gnash your teeth; for none of you will enter the Kingdom of Heavens; the justice of the Father takes into account all the instants of your life; second by second; and even less than what this microscopic unit of time represents; calculate the seconds that you have lived and you will have an idea of ​​the time that you will remain outside the Kingdom of Heavens; each second of life in which one lived with hope, represents a human existence that must be fulfilled in other worlds of the flesh; Do you understand now, religious demons and ambitious demons, why the world will judge you? You will be despised by every generation; your memory for the world will be synonymous with pain and frustration; you will be persecuted, just as you persecuted; and no one will speak to you; you will curse having deceived a world; having thrown the first stone of a mistaken determination; you asked to be the rectors of a world; and the world was worth more than you; you governed using immorality and deception; and there is no greater immorality than to despise the Father's law; your world will be shaken by the Revelation; a planetary event that has been occurring since all eternity; because you are not the only ones in the universe; your Creator is infinite; and the creation of him has no limit in anything; the crying and gnashing of teeth are infinite; because the worlds of the Father are like the grains of sand of a desert; the illusion to which the demons subjected you will make your surprise more painful; because you are submerged in ignorance; an ignorance that was hidden in comfort; the comfort that came out of a life system, which is not from the Father; and therefore no comfortable person in the world will enter the Kingdom of Heavens; nor any who enjoyed abundance; while others were starving; this Revelation that seems to be very rigorous, is not; for you yourselves requested it in the Kingdom; you asked to comply with the highest morality that can be conceived; the morality of the Commandments; and there is no greater one; and the opportunity was granted to you; because every life that the spirit undertakes is an opportunity it has to learn new things and unknown laws; it is to know elements that I did not know; new concepts of matter learn; a new salt of life comes to enrich the previous ones; a new concept amplifies the light; and more understands its Creator; there is a parallelism between the understanding towards its Creator, and the lives that are getting to know each other; understanding and knowledge are the same thing; both are known by learning; by the sweat of forehead; and all knowledge acquired in infinite existences, make only one; they make a single quality and quality in individuality; and at the same time, many transformations are experienced that also have their qualities and qualities; because no one is disinherited; your encounter in life with the beings that touched you, is not by chance; it is a destiny that you yourselves requested; and every social organization came out of the order of life; a nation, a town or population and a family in a home; they are requests that you yourselves made before coming to life; and everything is written in the solar books; at the same point where your creation originated; you must distinguish two creations in one; the creation as solar spirits; coming out of the sun Alpha and the sun Omega; and the request for life on a distant planet; the latter is a reincarnation; a way of knowing a life whose form is flesh; meat is one of the infinite forms of life; and there are infinite forms of the flesh; nothing has a limit in the Father; everything that comes out of the Father, has no number; belongs to the infinite; it is not given to anyone in the universe, to be able to calculate what belongs to the Father; your way of life isolated you from the rest of the universe; because you are tested; by your will; no one is forced into the world; it comes knowingly; and the first of the causes is to know why one comes to the worlds; your cause is written in the Scriptures; and this is: You will worship your Lord and Creator, above all things; above all life system; above all human pleasure; above all philosophy; above all destiny; over itself; behold the reason for the moments and seconds lived; many of you will say that it is impossible to do the daily chores, and to be thinking about the Father; this is a false concept and lacks spiritual depth; certainly the mind is occupied with his work; more, before starting the day, Do you remember the Father? Do you do things in his name? Truly I tell you that everyone who did not remember the Father for an instant, will not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; because you requested it that way in the Kingdom; and everything that is asked is fulfilled; your Creator was taught to you, he is everywhere; he is also in all instants; in all seconds; because no one is disinherited; neither matter and spirit; the instants are also living; and they have the same rights as your spirit; your life system that the demons of ambition gave you as the only alternative, condemned you; this condemnation was seen by my First-born Son, many centuries ago; and here is why he frightened the merchants from the temple; he saw in them the damnation of humanity itself; he saw how they would take advantage of other people's needs; he saw the corruption of money; he saw his children of the future, divided into rich and poor; he saw in them, all the calamities of the world; he saw the worst yoke on the planet; he saw in them, the causes of your crying and gnashing of teeth; yes children of the Earth; your satan is your own life system; and if you do not renounce it, you move further away from the Kingdom of Heavens; because the number of seconds lived in rape increases; none of your blind guides shall enter the Kingdom of Heavens; nor you who followed them; all the generations that have departed from Earth, none has entered the Kingdom of Heavens; neither shall any enter; and all because of the so-called capitalism and the so-called Catholic Church; two philosophies that are not known in the Kingdom; for every philosophy that divides the children of the Father is not known in the Kingdom of Heavens; because no creator of them has entered; nor any of his followers; the rock of human egoism spiritually distanced you from the Father; he clothed himself in respectability, while he reigned and broke the law; beautiful buildings and cathedrals on the outside, and corrupt on the inside; behold a parable that was written for the religious spirits; and the blind of the spirit did not realize; they only thought of magnifying a material concept taken from the Gospel by erroneous psychology; they moved away from true humility; they became idolaters; Do not their temples contain images? Truly I tell you, that everyone who prostrated himself before an idol or any image, will not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; and everyone who practiced material worship; material adoration is of Pharaonic origin; and the people of Israel transmitted it to the world; because these demons of the pharaonic dynasty were first on the face of the Earth; only my Firstborn Son knows the true history of the world; because there are many stories within the story; the damned pharaohs proclaimed themselves gods on Earth; teaching for the world, the first spiritual pride; which is equivalent to the call: Eternity and inviolability of the Holy Mother Church; hypocrites! No one is holy or holy in this world; true humility does not need titles that are worth nothing in the Kingdom of Heavens; because hypocrisy is not of the Kingdom; your so-called church has its days numbered; because nothing that is earthly endures; and much less those who aggrandized themselves by violating the Father's law; every violator of the law, if he is not judged below, is judged above; if he is not judged in life, he is judged in the spiritual world; because the law of the Father, which is infinite, makes what is above equal to what is below; and what is below is equal to what is above; to your religious rock, all the seconds of deceptions, which it provoked to others, will be deducted; from the very moment that he began to divide the faith of the flock; the number of seconds is immense; these demons must calculate the seconds that a century contains; and multiply them by the number of centuries that had divided the world of faith; and all this accumulation of seconds, must be distributed among all those who were religious; their number is known by the Father; more, each demon will receive the part of him wherever he is; the same for the creators of the damn money; creators are understood as those who controlled a greater part of the money, more than the others; those you call tycoons, rich, opulent, bankers, millionaires; and all the wage earners of the world; these last ones are safer than the great ones of the world; because every great is a major exploiter; and every minor an exploiter by imitation; the most varied range of merchants that the world knows are here; wage earners have the immense merit that they were exploited; behold the glory of every lesser; every exploited receives an addition in his heavenly score; and they are for him, all the seconds that the exploitation lasted; and the more humble and despicable his work was, according to the world, the score of his is multiplied by himself; that is why it was written: Every great will be despised and every humble exalted; because no one will want to belong to the group of those who were rich; and all who were humble; they will be envied; because they are closer to the gates of the Kingdom of Heavens; everyone will calculate your heavenly score; its addition; and this calculation is the one that indicates the spiritual hierarchy of each one; any addition calculation must be made from the age of twelve; from the instant in which each creature is aware of good and evil; before that age, all of you are innocent before the Creator; everyone is considered children of God; even if they have broken the law; and it is because of the innocence that you possess; innocence is the same ignorance that every creature has, in the face of the mysteries of infinity; and everyone has an innocence in the universe; because nobody knows more than the Father; more, all of you pay what you must pay; Just as quality and quality exist in your ideas, quality and quality also exist in your justice; this is because the faults committed in each one are not the same; circumstances vary ad infinitum; and for all there is justice; that is why it was written: With the rod that you measure, you will be measured; that is to say that from your qualities and qualities of your ideas, the quality and quality of your justice is born; justice is in yourselves; you began to create it, at the same instant, when you began to think; and this lasts until the last moment of your life; until the last breath; from the very moment that you read and understand the Revelation, a new score begins in you; because repentance is present; that she is also a daughter of the Father; as are all feelings; for the intellectuality and understanding of each one, the one who goes through the test of not knowing how to read, listens; and those who do not see, they do not listen or do not speak, the Father has nothing against them; for theirs is the Kingdom of Heavens; that is how they requested it in their tests; and I truly tell you, that there will not be happier creatures than these; that having eyes they could not see; that having a mouth they could not speak; that having ears they could not hear; because they are clean inside and out; the moral test that they carried throughout their lives, magnifies them before the Father; there is nothing immoral in them; and poor of those who made fun of these children; because they will not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; no mockery of the trials of his brothers, has ever entered the Kingdom; and all those who felt compassion as a result of pity; neither will they enter the Kingdom of the Father; the living ignorance of these beings, they lost them; the physical evidence of others, they should never have been looked at with pity and compassion; but with affection and respect; which is another morality; higher than pity and compassion; all the justice that you will receive is based on your own acts; even the smallest; and everyone who pronounced the least rudeness, will not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; Haven't you been taught that God is everywhere? He is also in every mouth; and everyone who scandalized with his eyes, will not enter the Kingdom; the latter, when the eyes of the flesh desired any woman; or any man; only after marriage can they desire each other; everyone who divorced them out of a whim, shall not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; and all those who made more than one flesh in life, will not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; one meat equals one marriage; and not to two or more; It was better for you to have remained a widower or widower than to have remarried; because you would have respected the law above all things; by remarrying, you lost the opportunity to enter the Kingdom; because you rejected the law of reward, out of respect for what belongs to the Father; and notice, that I do not cut off your free will; I leave you free to choose; more, you had an opportunity; the fact that you choose other paths is within your evolutionary law; the fact itself is part of your imperfection; and you yourselves mark the limit, to what extent you fulfill what is of the Father; everyone who showed their bodies of flesh to the world, shall not enter the Kingdom of Heavens for being immoral; and they will have to pay debt for each porito of meat scandalized; the pores of the flesh are as living as your spirit is; each porito possesses within its laws, a free will independent of the others; the pores of all flesh, were united to all spirit, to win in morality; and not in immorality; and as the heavenly mandate says: Everything humble and microscopic, is great in the Kingdom of Heavens; and the little pores of the flesh like the virtues of your spirit, acquire colossal proportions in the Kingdom; their forms are so immense that every spirit is filled with fear; and as everything is alive in the Kingdom, the poritos that were scandalized in the flesh galaxy, accuse the spirit of having exposed them to the malice and immorality of the world; they were born to know new morality, and they return to the Father, immoral; and all immorality caused to every pore, must be paid by the spirit; for every little pore that complains, it is an existence in a distant world, that every scandalous spirit must pay; some forgive; for there is everything in the Father's vineyard; your body has trillions of pores; which represents trillions of worlds; this quantity of worlds, explains that the distance of the spirits from the Kingdom of Heavens, is for eternities; from one world one passes to another and to another; paying the debt of the scandal; Yes son; I see that you think of the millions and millions of beings, who exhibit their bodies on the beaches of the world; I truly tell you, little son, that none of them will enter the Kingdom of Heavens and all male or female nudists are cursed; and all those who showed their bodies in magazines, movies or television; curse be on them and on their descendants, until the third generation; so it is and so it shall be until the consummation of the law; and everyone who, having asked for male sex, dressed as a woman; everyone who wore the hair of a woman before the world, shall not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; the sexes are living; and they have morals; or you are a man or you are a woman; the sexes unite with the spirits, to fulfill their laws as such; all scandalous of the so-called fashions, he divides his own sex between light and darkness; and in every sex all the virtues of the spirit are represented; and they all feel scandalized; because they all form a single alliance in human thinking; they form a whole above the whole; and they ask the Father, that the scandalous spirit, also be divided between light and darkness; This accusation on the part of all offended, whether of matter or spirit, has given rise to the maxim: An eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth; and the divine Father gives the reason, to the one who has been run over in his own laws; in your free will; the accusations in the Kingdom are by hierarchies; being humility and joy, the first two; and whoever had anger in life, does not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; even if that anger lasted less than a second; he who was happy as a child throughout his life, he will enter the Kingdom of Heavens; the divine Father rewards even the most minimal mental efforts; when they are born with the intention of making others happy; I recognize that the same life system created by the demons of exploitation and ambition, extinguished all universal joy on Earth; there can be no honest joy in the world, if some live in abundance and others in misery; true joy starts from true justice; the opposite is feigned joy; and truly I tell you, that it is easier for him to enter the Kingdom of Heaven, one who pretended to laugh, one who did not take the mental effort to laugh; one took pains and the other locked himself in spiritual hardness; and I truly tell you, that all those who had spiritual hardness, will not enter the Kingdom of the Father; spiritual hardness is the indifference towards what belongs to the Father; and no one who is indifferent will ever enter the Kingdom; as long as he is not interested in what is of the Father, as he was commanded; all who used vain fashions, can continue to use them; more, they will not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; by telling you that you can continue using them, it is because you have free will; your Creator does not pray to anyone; he gives the children the opportunity to choose their own path; the Father illustrates and the children choose; behold the divine psychology, with which the Scriptures were written; and were written starting from themselves, the principle of all proof of life; the Holy Scriptures represent the free will of the Father; a divine way of thinking, regarding a world, that he asked to be tested; and for each world of the universe, your Creator has a divine psychology; because there is everything in his flock; and no one is disinherited; each world and each sun, have their own Scriptures; matter and spirit possess it; the Scriptures are requested by the same creatures of the worlds; because they are related to their destinations; and the letter of all Scripture is also living; because everything that comes out of the Father, becomes life; and everything that moves away from the Father, is lost in darkness; disobedience to his laws is one of the most common ways to get lost in the darkness; the justice that you yourselves requested, is the most rigorous; and its equivalence is in the Commandments; you asked to comply with a moral, which in reality would have been possible, if the ambitious spirits had not been born in the world; those who created wealth and along with it, an unknown morality; a morality that is immoral; because eternal morality will never come out, if it is divided by dividing the children; in rich and poor; true morality comes out of the very Word of the Creator; because his Word is eternal; and its consequences equal; What morality can those who have deceived the world offer? Because there is no rich man who has not deceived his peers; the morality of the world is hypocrisy and falsehood; millions of beings appear what they are not; because they are covered with a weak varnish; the outside deceives the world; more, it cannot deceive the interior; because the interior accuses him before the Father; the false of the world; those who allowed themselves to be deluded, will not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; and all those who served by force will not enter the Kingdom either; my divine Commandment says: You shall not kill; Why then do my children prepare to kill their own brothers? Why do they wear uniforms, which extol the force? Truly I tell you, that everyone who wore the uniform of the so-called armed forces, no one will enter the Kingdom of Heavens; by these spirits it was written: He who kills with the sword, dies with the sword; he means that all force is brought down by force in other worlds; if the mandate says you shall not kill, your philosophy of preparing to kill is an attack against the world and against the Father's law; against matter and against spirit; and against the elements of nature; Don't you test fucking weapons of mass destruction? When your spirits are judged, the whole universe will be against you; because your philosophy of strength attempted against everyone; against matter and against spirit; and you will ask to go to distant worlds, in which you will be the threatened ones; and you will be in constant anxiety; the same sensations that you provoked in others, because of your philosophy of force, will be provoked in yourselves; the force is unknown in the Kingdom of Heavens; she is the product of little evolved worlds; no creator of the so-called force has entered the Kingdom; nor the followers of him; the strength in the Kingdom has another concept; there the force is creative and not like yours, which is destructive; every destroyer of whatever world it may be, is also destroyed; as it has happened with all the warriors and conquerors of your world; none of those you call heroes, has entered the Kingdom; nor will they enter; until they have paid, down to the last molecule of blood, for all the bodies they mutilated; of all pores; cells, veins etc.; because they all have their living philosophies; their rights and their laws; their Scriptures; just as your spirit has it; and no one can say otherwise; because no one is unique and no one is exclusive; you are microbes of meat; said lovingly by your Creator; and no one who has not been a microbe, will be able to become great in the Kingdom; because one has to be small and humble, to become great in the Kingdom of Heavens; and all the great ones of the Kingdom were also like you; they were meat monkeys; because the justice of the Father is universal; and has neither beginning nor end; just as your material universe is; justice is in matter and spirit, because everything is living within its laws; your life is not the only one; Do you not see that the worlds follow one another infinitely? Nothing shows you that you are the only ones; the presence of the universe proves the opposite; his very presence; and I truly tell you, that everyone who seeing the greatness of the Father's creation, and was indifferent to it, will not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; indifference is never rewarded; much less the one that refers to what belongs to the Father; your Creator demands of you what corresponds to him; what you promised in the Kingdom; everything that is in your alliance; between matter and spirit; between molecules and virtues; between microbes and the elements; The alliance is called Ark of the Covenants; which means Materialization of the elements that came out of the Alpha sun; a solar life principle; the cause of causes; justice is born together with you; because from the previous existence that you had, a justice came out in the form of geometry; the one that gave rise to your body of flesh and your spirit; that geometry is the salt of life; it is the knowledge of what has been learned in existence; the salt of life is spirituality, reinforced with a new magnetism; that is added to those already achieved by the spirit in its previous existences; all life is a magnetization that has its quality and quality; his merit; the highest quality and quality of a life is represented by obedience to the Father above all things; when what was promised to the Father is not fulfilled, the whole universe suffers; because the matter that accompanied you in life claims against the injustices of the spirit; all are living before the Father; and all return to the Father; your most generalized concept of the beyond does not take matter into account; deep error; because no one is disinherited; if you had studied my Word since you were little, you would have reached true conclusions; moreover, you requested very materialized parents; who toiled for you in life, not with the intention of pleasing the Father as they were commanded; but to be in tune with the world; and you cannot serve two masters; and I truly tell you, that no Father who lived with illusions and materialized, will enter the Kingdom of Heavens; behold the blind who passed on their blindness to their children; causing them the greatest of tragedies; because none of your children will enter the Kingdom; behold the crying and gnashing of teeth, of millions and millions of creatures, who will curse their parents and the customs that they instilled in them; and parents will curse their parents; and these to their parents; because blindness and error began from the past; millions and millions of marriages will have to separate; because two violators of the law, perpetuate their estrangement from the Kingdom of Heavens; they multiply error in their children; they transmit it to them by carnal inheritance; Yes son; I know you are thinking about the marriages of the world; and you see, the desperation of materialism; his entire building collapses; the creators of the gold that deluded and deceived the world, will be despised and even persecuted; for every philosophical tree that the Father did not plant will be uprooted in the human evolution; and all the gold in the world will not be touched; no manned warship; nor death cannon served; the world will get rid of one of its worst yokes; the armament; another of the beasts that will be judged; a yoke created to profit a group of demons; my innocent children pay for the weapons, so that the slaughter may take place in themselves; I truly tell you that no manufacturer of weapons will enter the Kingdom of Heavens; nor any of his sons until the third generation; and they are cursed by Father Jehovah; and no one should speak to them; they run the risk of falling into the same law of curse; the same law must be applied to everyone who trafficked in wars; and those who conspired to produce a war; so it is and so it will be until the third generation; and everyone who took any weapon shall not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; the Commandment that was taught to him says: You shall not kill; and you will not kill above all things; the term: Above all things, it was to avoid the creature, having to serve two masters; between two impulses coming out of an intention, the best impulse is from God; killing another similar or preparing to do so, is not of God; it is from the devil; because it goes against the law of the Father; and all those who presented toys representative of strength and war to innocence, shall not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; for corrupting innocence; tempting them from small, to violate the law of the Father; and everyone who made a scandal in front of children, it would be better for him not to have been born; they will be cursed until the third generation; all those who published pornography and those who lent themselves to it, cursed be; they will not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; and all those men and women who showed their naked bodies in the damned cabarets of the world, damned be to the third generation; and every dealer in meat, cursed be to the third generation; and all those who stepped on establishments or places of scandal, shall not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; no immoral person has entered the Kingdom; and everyone who showed themselves drunk before the world, will not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; and if their vices were seen by the innocence of children, cursed are they to the third generation; and everyone who tried drugs, will not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; and if they were seen even for an instant, by any boy or girl, cursed be to the third generation; and everyone who trafficked in drugs, is cursed by Father Jehovah; so also they, they will be corrupted in other worlds; everyone who violated any sex, cursed be to the third generation; and cursed be the judges who did not sentence them to life; every judge who received money for practicing justice must resign from the post of judge; for those who exploited any justice will not enter the Kingdom; and the longer they remain as judges, the more they distance themselves from the Kingdom of Heavens; with every second that passes, they move further away from the Kingdom; and everyone who allows himself or herself to be dominated by any vice, every second that passes, moves further and further away from the Kingdom of the Father; moreover, if the creature repents, this estrangement ceases; and it remains at the same point, where repentance occurred; everyone who practiced gambling and played money, will not enter the Kingdom of Heavens if they were single; and everyone who, being married and having children, was a gambler, damn them; they have no right to corrupt my innocence, with bad habits; not a few children, will not enter the Kingdom of Heavens, for imitating their parents; every fault has degrees; as has the light; and all become creditors to the law of curse, when there are children involved; should be considered a child in this law, every baby and up to twelve years of age; and if the child is over twelve, there is always the immoral example; more, will already have a child, past twelve; he knows in the first degree, good and evil by intuition; he only lacks the experience of life; when vice is committed in front of another older person, who is not vice, the fault is reduced to three thirds of a whole; the corruption of spirits, it leads complete humanities not to enter the Kingdom of Heavens; the vice and corruption of your world were born from the life system that the ambitious demons gave you; they are the material causes of the tragedy of this humanity; from them comes all calamity; because there is no greater scandal than dividing a herd between rich and poor; A microscopic injustice in a life system is enough, and tragedy is unleashed for a world; all evil had to be rejected from the beginning; it was part of the test of life; your life must have been a life of infinite caution in the face of the insinuations of the Father in the Scriptures; Was not your Creator first, above all things? And you have done the opposite; for you the first thing is gold; pleasure; he removes as much as possible to work; every bad habit it is like weeds; it must be plucked from the garden; and when it is uprooted it returns to darkness; this is how your awakening will be before the Revelation; your crying and gnashing of teeth is the uprooting of rotten grass; because no corrupted creature will remain in this world; no demon will remain; only the innocence that did not manage to corrupt your life system will remain; because every child is saved from the final judgment; every sinner will depart from this world, cursing having been born; cursing a world that took him away from the Kingdom of Heaven; for no earthly power will make him enter the Kingdom; human seas will follow the Firstborn Son; because all power was given to him to judge the living and the dead; those who are in this world and those who are out of the world; his divine Power is not for one world only; it is for infinite worlds; whose number is like the number of grains of sand that a desert contains; the Trinity Son has the same powers as the Trinity Father; because they are in each other; and they conserve their individualities and free will; you all have the trinity; because no one is disinherited; moreover, the sinners and violators of the Father's law move away from his light; and they transform their own trinity, into a trinity of darkness; it was your free will that chose; nobody forced you to be sinners; willpower you had in life; you asked for infinite paths in the Kingdom; and your free will chose; if you fell into this existence, others will come; for there is no limit whatsoever in the Father; it's never too late to start; an Eternal Father comforts his children in his falls; however sinful they may have been; moreover, the law is fulfilled in the same way; the causes of your tragedy, are the same ones that govern the world; collect from them the eternity that you have lost; they deluded you; they tempted you with their gold; they entertained you; while your life moved away more and more from the Kingdom of the Father; because at every moment the seconds of life are added; the illusion-second and the reality-second; behold, the value of your seconds will change the history of humanity; because there will be no false history left; because the qualities and qualities of your ideas, which are born within seconds of time, will change; and changing the mental philosophy, changes the world; the greatest Intellectual Revolution begins for your world; in which the humble will be envied; the presence of my First-born Son will embarrass those who hoarded the wealth; wealth should never have existed as such; because everything is consumed by the world; the so-called wealth is the product of a mental-demonic calculation; Well, it's not fair. for some have others in perpetuity and others lack in perpetuity; because of the philosophy of wealth, the world does not expect happiness; only crying and gnashing of teeth, can offer you; the events that are approaching will show it to you; every rich man must deliver to those who have nothing, what never belonged to him; My Commandments command no one to become rich or poor; everyone deserves equality; an equality that should always have existed; equality is in nature; you are born with it; because you all enjoy the same laws; no one takes away a microscopic part of the laws of the elements; and those who are born blind, deaf or dumb or any physical defect, it is because they so requested; and so it was granted to them; and the cause of it, are the violations of the past; events that occurred in other existences; Were you not taught; that every spirit is born again? He means that many existences have had and will have; that he will reincarnate in infinite bodies, for all eternity; Haven't you realized that an existence is not enough to know everything? Millions of you were blind; the comfort of your life system on the one hand, and your ignorance in my Scriptures on the other, sank you more; because I truly tell you, that it is easier for one who made an effort fighting to get rid of the bad influence of his own lifestyle to enter my Kingdom, than another who did nothing; every effort is rewarded in the Kingdom; and among all the efforts, those that refer to the Father, are the most rewarded; because your Creator is moved; He feels as you feel; what is above is the same as what is below; what you have in a microscopic degree, the Father possesses in an infinite degree; Weren't you taught that God is in everyone and everywhere? The presence of the Father is not material before you; because you yourselves requested it that way, before leaving the Kingdom of Heavens; this was in circumstances, to which your life was a test; and he has greater merit before the Father, a test of life that was imposed by itself, his own difficulties; because he promised to defeat them; and the greatest stumbling block for every spirit is not seeing its Creator; that is why you requested a divine helper called faith; without the faith of belief, no test can be overcome; because no creature that did not have faith, he will enter the Kingdom of the Father; faith moves mountains you were taught; because true faith can do everything; until entering the Kingdom of the Father; those who currently have faith, were in the past of their existences, the greatest unbelievers; because the spirit goes through everything in its perfection towards the Father; and the great unbelievers of today; they will be the great believers of tomorrow; a man who believes without seeing is a highly evolved spirit; and the one who asks for evidence to believe, he is a very backward spirit; the one who does not ask for proofs, went through the phase of asking for such proofs; and the one currently asking for proof is just beginning, what the other has already finished; the tests that refer to the envoys of the Father, were given to all of you; more, not all of you asked for them; many of you ask my envoys for proof; and when you are not pleased, you doubt; I truly tell you that everyone who asked my First-born Son for proof and did not study the Father's Scriptures in life, will not enter the Kingdom of Heavens; because he did not prepare himself in knowledge, to claim such a prize; he has no merit to aspire to such a thing; ignorance cannot be rewarded; and much less when the knowledge was ignored by its own will.-

comments.author: Iroh
comments.body: I honestly did try to read all what you wrote but I gave up at some point. It was painful on my eyes to read all that. I also don’t think this write up is in relation to bitcoin but I may be wrong cause I gave up on reading the whole thing. While bitcoin is changing the world, mankind can not be saved by bitcoin.

I definitely agree and I, however, don't think this post will last long here. I tried to read different parts of it, I don't see the correlation with Bitcoin but maybe a copy from scripture I guess

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: OP, I think when creating threads like this, it is better to just point out the few fine parts of the whole story and maybe put a reference link so members with an interest in your topic could visit the reference link if they are not satisfied with the information you have already provided. The thread is so jam-packed and there is no reference either.

I also don’t think this write up is in relation to bitcoin but I may be wrong cause I gave up on reading the whole thing. While bitcoin is changing the world, mankind can not be saved by bitcoin. you must read the whole text to understand what I am saying, bitcoin is the salvation, here it demonstrates it and takes us to a deep level about the problem it solves.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Fiat currencies around the world are losing purchasing power. Lots are beginning to become worthless, almost like toilet paper. The $ will be the last domino to fall, it may not be imminently but it will happen. Bitcoin is where you want to store your money, it’s the lifebelt for the absolute carnage that will come. You need to protect your financial future, bitcoin is the perfect asset for this purpose.
